organization.name: FBI: Farcaster Builders India
organization.description: Farcaster Builders India - A collective of Indian founders, builders, and operators obsessed with building on top and accelerating the Superchain.

forms.name: FBI Fellowship Application 2025
forms.description: Apply to join our exclusive builder fellowship program. Selected builders will receive funding, mentorship, and access to our network.

questions.label: Tell us about your experience in blockchain development
questions.placeholder: Describe your projects, skills, and experience...

questions.label: What do you hope to achieve through this fellowship?

answers.q8: I've been developing on Ethereum for 3 years, built multiple DeFi protocols and contributed to several open-source projects...
answers.q9: I want to expand my knowledge in ZK tech and build privacy-preserving applications...

submissions.notes: Strong technical background, active in hackathons

answers.q8: Full-stack developer with focus on smart contracts. Built multiple NFT projects and DEXs...
answers.q9: Looking to collaborate with other builders and launch a new protocol...

submissions.notes: Excellent candidate, has won multiple hackathons

selectionCriteria.name: Technical Skills
selectionCriteria.description: Evaluation of technical capabilities based on GitHub activity and prior projects

selectionCriteria.name: Onchain Activity
selectionCriteria.description: Assessment of blockchain experience through transaction history and contract deployments

selectionCriteria.name: Vision & Goals
selectionCriteria.description: Clarity and alignment of applicant's goals with the fellowship mission

selectionCriteria.name: Community Engagement
selectionCriteria.description: Participation in the broader blockchain community

emailTemplates.name: Selected Applicants
emailTemplates.subject: Congratulations on Your FBI Fellowship Selection!
emailTemplates.body:
Dear {{name}},

We are thrilled to inform you that you have been selected for the FBI Fellowship program! Your technical expertise, blockchain experience, and vision for the future of web3 impressed our selection committee.

Next steps:
1. Please confirm your acceptance by replying to this email within 7 days
2. Join our Discord community: {{discordLink}}
3. Schedule your onboarding call: {{calendarLink}}

We look forward to welcoming you to our community of builders!

Best regards,
The FBI Team

emailTemplates.name: Rejected Applicants
emailTemplates.subject: Update on Your FBI Fellowship Application
emailTemplates.body:
Dear {{name}},

Thank you for your interest in the FBI Fellowship program. We received an overwhelming number of applications this year, and after careful review, we regret to inform you that we are unable to offer you a place in this cohort.

We encourage you to apply again in the future and to continue your journey in web3 development.

Best regards,
The FBI Team
